title: How to cs properly??
body:
Im currently bronze 4 and I've been having trouble with csing. Rocka a friend of mine on league told me to have he mentality of improving and not winning, I will take his word for it. So I'm thinking of improving my csing skills. My average cs in 5 mins is about 26-30 and you can say its pretty bad. Any tips please??

P.S: I know I've been putting up a lot of threads.. Sorry!!

replies.body: Like what the others have said I found going into a custom game and practicing to be the most helpful for me.

something i do when i go top speacially with the cannons you know how much damage you do so left click on the cannon and you see the hp it has left just dance around till its just below and then kill it.{{champion:106}}

you should be aiming for last hits on the mobs dont waste ur mana you really should be hitting 120-150+ bye 20minutes last hits are important if ur an adc and the support is screwing you over even bye just hiting throwing out the hp balance for ur damage out put unless the support is useing {{item:3401}}  i wish support players used gold runes and gold items to stop them from hiting the cs 5 gp10 at lvl 1 even if your building AP etc. is enough to help you get items! 
{{champion:201}}

in the solo lanes its about balancing harassment + last hitting with abilities and autos. remember to constantly be moving, practice last hitting and positioning in custom, thats what i do and i have gotten way better over the past month.
26-30 by 5 isnt actually terrible. What do you normally end up with by 10?

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=kEMB188s,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-26T00:07:50.560+0000)
>
> 26-30 by 5 isnt actually terrible. What do you normally end up with by 10?

I end up with about umm 60 - 70

That's not even that bad dude! Try aim for 80-90! Everyone says 100cs per 10 minutes but I find that to be incredibly difficult. Even LCS Pros dont get that much. Also, taking the 5 more damage towards creeps in your masteries helps. I've never gone into a custom game to practice (I don't have the patience/attention span) but I think a very BIG portion of it comes down to knowing your champion's attack animation, getting familiar with it will really help.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=kEMB188s,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-26T12:34:13.693+0000)
>
> That's not even that bad dude! Try aim for 80-90! Everyone says 100cs per 10 minutes but I find that to be incredibly difficult. Even LCS Pros dont get that much. Also, taking the 5 more damage towards creeps in your masteries helps. I've never gone into a custom game to practice (I don't have the patience/attention span) but I think a very BIG portion of it comes down to knowing your champion's attack animation, getting familiar with it will really help.

Thanks bro, i will make sure to tweak some of my masteries xD{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

go into a custom game and just last hit with no runes. no masteries and try not to use ability's. Aim for at least 85 in 10 mins. Just repeat over and over until you can get 85 or more consistently. gl friend :D

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=kEMB188s,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-26T01:55:13.235+0000)
>
> go into a custom game and just last hit with no runes. no masteries and try not to use ability's. Aim for at least 85 in 10 mins. Just repeat over and over until you can get 85 or more consistently. gl friend :D

Thnx man xD

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=kEMB188s,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-26T01:55:13.235+0000)
>
> go into a custom game and just last hit with no runes. no masteries and try not to use ability's. Aim for at least 85 in 10 mins. Just repeat over and over until you can get 85 or more consistently. gl friend :D

I plus this, honestly this helped me.
just keep practicing. if you cant get the hang of it after a year of playing just main support and jungle

Aside from training to cs also tell us what are your runes? If you don't have a good amount of AD it might be hard to last hit also do you have the mastery that gives more damage towards minions chosen?

You can look up "lol cs training" and theres some exercises you can do in a custom game.

Mostly it just comes with practice.
A lot of people say to go into a custom, use no runes or masteries, pick Soraka and go to town on that farm.
